description.text: Design valuation incorporates insights from marketing engineers and sales engineers to help improve product design. Users can easily identify the restricted policies applied by the admin. Over 700 users have been added.
The dashboard with a tile view provides a holistic overview of total unique users, app configurations, app launch count, diagnostics, connector status, licenses, and more.
The dashboard's list view provides users with more detailed data points. The entire page design structure was developed following a heuristic study.
The dashboard's tile view provides an overall status score for customers/sites as a quick view and offers detailed scores at the customer level.
Adopted a new design style to match the organization's product suite. Designed navigation and page structure.
Adopted a new design style to match the organization's product suite. Introduced editing capabilities for the primary and secondary connectivity at the table row level.
Enhanced the user experience and introduced more action controls in the table structure.
The primary goal was to provide the entire software and configuration deployment staging process, allowing the user to control both manual and automatic activation.
The primary goal was to provide the entire software and configuration deployment staging process, allowing the user to control both manual and automatic activation.
Adopted a new design style to match the organization's product suite.
My responsibility involved establishing the new visual design language for the products, encompassing page layout, components, typefaces, and the design style guide.
Implemented a granular view for the app details, incorporating established visual design patterns.
Improved user experience by implementing primary and secondary level navigations, along with a table view structure featuring accordion functionality to display additional data.
Developed a cohesive visual design language, incorporating design patterns and creating a comprehensive design style guide.
Aligned the visual design exercise with the company's product suite.
Aligned the visual design exercise with the company's product suite.
Aligned the visual design exercise with the company's product suite.
Aligned the visual design exercise with the company's product suite. Designed the payment related components.
Commissioned project, worked on navigation, page structure and visual designs.

The inaugural T20 World Cup took place in South Africa. Users were able to engage with live matches, upcoming fixtures, and past match details. Additionally, I established the entire visual design patterns, including page layout, color scheme, and alignment with both T20 and Yahoo! brand identities. The entire ideation, design process, and execution took just three weeks.

title.text: First ever T20 cricket world cup web page design

description.text: The International Cricket Council (ICC) was highly impressed by the T20 World Cup and Yahoo! Cricket page designs. As a result, they sought to redesign the ICC web pages to resemble Yahoo! Cricket.

title.text: International Cricket Council web page redesigned

description.text: Designing the Flight TV interface was a different experience, and I enjoyed it!

text.text:
Born in Halehalla, Uttara Kannada District, Karnataka State.

Mix of urban and rural diverse cultures are influences shaping my work of art. I am always passionate about experimenting and experiencing different materials/techniques. While experimenting with twisted color threads indeed offer a rich experience with their intense colors, varied textures, dimensions, and dynamic qualities. It's fascinating how such elements can add depth and vibrancy to my work of art. Incorporating dimensional objects further enhances the depth and feeling to my projects. Exploring the possibilities with twisted color threads in sculpture as well.

Exploring the world of food for artistic inspiration is truly delightful! The colors, textures, and patterns found in traditional dishes like “Dosas” (a regular breakfast food in my native) can be a treasure trove for creating works of art.

Again, Jackfruit, a naturally growing fruit in my native area, has always fascinated me with its vibrant color and unique textures. Through a creative journey, I've explored its natural composition and translated it into aesthetic forms.
SHOWS:
2023 Group show (DAKAHAVISA), Bangalore
2023 Invited artist at Chitrasante, Bangalore
2022 Group show (DAKAHAVISA), Bangalore
2021 Group show (DAKAHAVISA), Bangalore
2000 Solo show, sponsored by Cafe Coffee Day, Bangalore
1999 Karnataka Lalit Kala Academy Art Camp, Udupi, Karnataka
1993 National Kala Mela, Bangalore
1992 National Art Exhibition, Nagpur
GRADUATIONS:
MFA in Painting - 1999 - ChitrakaIa Institute of Advanced Studies, Bangalore
BFA in Painting - 1993 - College of visual arts, Gulbarga
DFA in Painting - 1992 - College of arts, Davangere
I'm working as a UX designer and an art practitioner at Bangalore.
Floating Threads!
